channel.title: One-Off on winnyace's blog
channel.description: Recent content in One-Off on winnyace's blog

item.title: OUTDATED AND POTENTIALLY WRONG! Fixing a new bug that causes TF2 to crash on startup on Linux.
item.description: DISCLAIMER Hi! It’s winny from the future. This article is: Very old; Potentially incorrect in the Debian section entirely! I decided to leave this article up for the sake of historical purposes, but this issue has been fixed, I believe, since the introduction of the 64-bit client for Team Fortress 2, almost a year ago. As such, please don’t use this article. If you have issues with something regarding Team Fortress 2 and Linux, check TF2’s ProtonDB page.
